name: IridescencePalette, Haseritt
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to five of your normal unit rear-guards, and until end of turn, they get [Power] +2000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.". If you chose three or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Grimoire Etoile, Luticia
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When you play a normal order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

・Two or more‐Draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
・Four or more‐At the end of that battle, [COST][discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Highest Dreamer, Lilfa
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and all of your grade 2 or greater rear-guards get "Boost" until end of turn.

If you returned two cards, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).

name: To Work Harder, Mediell
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Peaceful Garden, Anika
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)

name: Soft Light, Pruel
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)

name: All Set Up!
effect:
(After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone)
[ACT]Order Zone:If you have a vanguard with "Michu" in its card name, [COST][[Rest] this card], [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one Cannonball card from your hand, and put it into your Order Zone.

name: IridescencePalette, Haseritt
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to five of your normal unit rear-guards, and until end of turn, they get [Power] +2000, and "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, draw a card, and put this unit on the bottom of your deck.". If you chose three or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Grimoire Etoile, Luticia
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When you play a normal order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following according to the number of Cursed Play cards in your soul.
・Two or more‐Draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
・Four or more‐At the end of that battle, [COST][discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Highest Dreamer, Lilfa
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and all of your grade 2 or greater rear-guards get "Boost" until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have three or more grade 2 or greater rear-guards in your back row, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a rear-guard each from your front row and back row, and return them to your hand. If you returned two cards, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).

name: Passionate Devotee, Sytreide
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if it was placed during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.

name: Fondant Solace, Mediell
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], reveal the top card of your deck, and perform one of the effects below depending on that card's type.
・Normal Unit‐Put that revealed card into your hand, choose a card from your drop, call it to (RC), and that called unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
・Trigger Unit‐[Counter-Charge 1], choose a card from your drop, and call it to (RC).

name: #Make_A_Trend!! Kyouka
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade from 1 to 3, declare it, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with the declared grade from among them and call it to (RC), or choose up to one Magazine card from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you played a Magazine order this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.

name: First to Head Towards a Dream! Michu
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you have a "All Set Up!" in your Order Zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.
Cannonball-[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

[Glitter]

name: Adorable Shooter, Clanfelie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][put a grade 2 or less card from hand into soul], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 with [Power] 12000 or less, grade 2 with [Power] 9000 or less, or grade 1 with [Power] 7000 or less card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you did not call a card, draw a card.

name: Immense Aptitude, Relie
effect:
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has no cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, this unit performs drive checks until end of that battle.

name: Overflow Happiness, Naustria
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name, look at the top three cards of your deck, choose one card from among them, put it into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has two or more Cursed Play cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If your soul has four or more Cursed Play cards, [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.

name: Dearly Flowers, Alise
effect:
[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked a grade 3 or greater unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from drop by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, this unit gets "[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn.

name: Blue Frontier, Arche
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you played a Magazine order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacked, if you played a Magazine order this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Boisterous High Tension, Roxella
effect:
Friend-[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have three or more other "Friends", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you have five or more, choose one of your rear-guards with the "Friend" ability not in the same column as this unit, and you may return it to your hand.

name: Cooling Heart, Yuika
effect:
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit in the same column as this unit is placed, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of the boosted rear-guards, and return it to your hand.

name: Shy Vocal, Noqno
effect:
[AUTO]Drop:When a card is put into your Order Zone, if you do not have a unit with "Noqno" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to your back row center (RC).
[Glitter]-Michu
[AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and swap the position of your vanguard with this unit. At the end of that turn, swap the position of that swapped unit with this unit.

name: Early Adoptor, Loviisa
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], choose a "Lyrical ShootingStarS" from your drop, and put it into your hand.

name: Early Afternoon Elegance, Racclene
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit cannot attack the vanguard, and this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Approaching Summer, Aaltje
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is returned to hand by your vanguard's ability, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Squeeze Out, Unity
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your Order Zone, and put it into your hand.

name: Schedule Coordinating, Remory
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your Order Zone has "All Set Up!", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a Cannonball card from your drop, and put it into your Order Zone.

name: Solis Lacrima, Ninon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your soul. If you put it into your soul, look at the top card of your deck.

name: Almost Late! Prufla
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lilfa" in its card name, choose a grade 2 or less normal unit with "Lilfa" in its card name from your drop, and you may put it into your soul. If you put it into your soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Hydrangea Awaiting Clear Weather, Philine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Favorite One, Fleurety
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is returned to hand by your grade 3 or greater vanguard's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], draw a card, choose up to one grade 3 card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).

name: Aiming for Rainbow, Theophania
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your damage zone has more cards than your opponent's, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Large Wheel that Colors the Night, Palmira
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, you may put this card into your soul.

name: Shape of Cat's Cradle, Sylphia
effect:
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is put on the bottom of your deck during your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit's attack hit a vanguard, [COST][put this unit on the bottom of deck], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Especial Days, Faustina
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your other units.

name: Running High, Menia
effect:
Friend-[CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have other "Friends", this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Neverending Summer, Tatum
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your damage zone has a face up order card, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put a unit card from hand into your damage zone face up], choose a face up order card from your damage zone, and put it into your hand.

name: Diva of Aptness, Astrid
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your rear-guard is placed by the ability of your grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Mediell" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to an open (RC).

name: Shutter Chance, Ilse
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, if your Order Zone has "All Set Up!", look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one [Glitter] or set order from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you revealed a card, put this unit on the bottom of your deck.

name: Class is Boring, Modett
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Luticia" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a Cursed Play card from your drop, and put it into your hand.

name: Swelting Heat, Lucretia
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and look at the top card of your deck.

name: Meddlesome Wellness Committee, Phyllis
effect:
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your grade 3 or greater vanguards with "Mediell" in its card name, and until end of turn, it gets [Power] +5000, and the cost of that unit's original [ACT] ability becomes "[Counter-Blast 1]".
[AUTO](RC):When your other unit is placed on (RC) from drop, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Fascinating Disposition, Varii
effect: Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, if your soul has no cards, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

effect: Powerful-[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Herminia" in its card name, if your soul has no cards, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000 until end of turn. name: Favor To You, Lijdia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Fortia" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [Counter-Charge 1]." until end of turn.

name: Best Choice, Laudomia
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kyouka" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your drop with a different card name as your vanguard, and put it on the top of your deck.

name: Mystica Pellucid, Jennifer
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have four or more units, [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a normal order from your drop, and it gets "[CONT]:This card can be played from the drop, and when it would be put into your drop after play, put it on the bottom of your deck instead." until end of turn.

name: Positive Mind, Elsa
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for every two of your units.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Haseritt" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, at the end of that battle, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your back row center rear-guards, and move it to an open front row (RC).

name: Two Of Us, Flow

name: Two Of Us, Rhyme
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Flower Cannonball
effect:
Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!

[AUTO]:When this card is put into your Order Zone, draw a card.
[ACT]Order Zone:If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Michu" in its card name, [COST][put this card into your drop], and change all of your vanguard's Cannonball abilities to "[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose three of your units, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn." until end of turn.

name: Lyrical ShootingStarS

Play this if you have a vanguard with "Kyouka" in its card name!
Perform all of the following according to the number of your units.

・Two or more grade 3 units‐[Counter-Charge 1].
